 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָר‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==in Moab, south of Arnon== (<span class="bdbLangGreek">Ηρ</span> [[Num.21.15|Num 21:15]], elsewhere chiefly <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αροηρ</span>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Num.21.15|Num 21:15]]; [[Deut.2.9|Deut 2:9]]; [[Deut.2.18|Deut 2:18]]; [[Deut.2.29|Deut 2:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָר מוֺאָד‎</span> [[Num.21.28|Num 21:28]]; [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]] — usually interpreted as capital ***city*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָר‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר‎</span>) of Moab ([[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 398</sup> compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ער‎</span> ***fortified height***, compare [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Him. Inschr. 29</sup> [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>Ét. Sab. 159</sup> so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, dialect of Yemen); [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr.269 f.</sup> thinks name of ***district*** South of Arnon.
